classes.cCustomNote: One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, Upper-Division B, C1, C2, Lower-Division C Elective, Upper-Division C, D1, Upper-Division D, E, and GE Elective. Refer to online catalog for GE course selection and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR).
